messages.content: My girlfriend made the cutest and most touching card for my birthday. I practically cried reading it. [SEP] I almost did. It was hard holding the tears back.
{"context": "sentimental"}
I was walking through my hallway a few week ago_comma_ and my son was hiding under the table and grabbed my ankle. I thought i was got.  [SEP] I would probably scream also.
{"context": "surprised"}

I helped out a doctor's office that's located within my office tge medical assistant wasn't good at phlebotomy and old comes over and ask me for my help i had no problem helping .. During Christmas they dropped off a gift for the providers and myself .. I was totally surprised. [SEP] It was she wasn't really good ans i had no problem helping
{"context": "surprised"}
I love it_comma_ though most times it could be killing. [SEP] It's kinda annoying to me when people don't call you back.
{"context": "surprised"}
today i saw one of my old friend [SEP] well im glad it did not go in the wrong direction
{"context": "surprised"}
A while ago i was walking to college and j-crossed the street_comma_ to my shock I got a ticket. [SEP] Exactly_comma_ especially when you get one for just walking.
{"context": "surprised"}

Recently on my birthday_comma_ I didn't expect to receive any gifts from my fiance since he's been pretty broke. He ended up getting me a bouquet of flowers and taking me out to dinner_comma_ which I wasn't expecting at all. [SEP] Wow!  Sounds like a keeper right there!  That must have been a nice surprise for you!
{"context": "surprised"}
My friends planned a second baby shower for me without me knowing. [SEP] It must have been an enjoyable day. You have nice friends!
{"context": "surprised"}
I need to use my car to drive somewhere.  When I walked over_comma_ I saw that it had been hit [SEP] My car was hit while parked
{"context": "surprised"}
i was shocked to learn that i had been called to serve on a jury ! [SEP] i honestly have never gone to jury duty _comma_ but im sure it was still a pain to put it on your schedule
{"context": "surprised"}
